author: marcus.johnson
text: @alex.chen before you go on vacation — I need the Redis replication decision (single vs multi-region) by Monday morning at the latest. Tom and I are blocked on the load test setup without it.

author: james.liu
text: GraphQL prototype benchmarks are in! Analytics queries: 3x faster, 40% smaller payloads. I really think we should make this a Sprint 14 priority. Wrote up a one-pager. @alex.chen can we chat before you leave?

author: tom.anderson
text: FYI — the Redis cluster is stable but I want to do a failover test before we put production traffic on it. Planning for Tuesday. Will need Marcus to coordinate on the auth migration side.

author: sarah.kim
text: Reminder: Alex is OOO next week (Feb 10-14). I'll be covering PM duties. Please escalate anything urgent to me. Alex — please send me the handoff doc by EOD today.

author: priya.patel
text: Starting the detailed Dashboard V2 specs based on the Option B mockups. Should have wireframes for the main views by mid-week. Will need PM review — @sarah.kim can you cover while Alex is out?

author: david.park
text: Auth migration arch review follow-up on Tuesday 3pm. We need to finalize the replication topology. Alex, if you're out, who's representing your team? This can't slip again.

author: priya.patel
text: Happy Friday tomorrow! Anyone doing anything fun this weekend?

author: james.liu
text: Going skiing at Tahoe! Perfect snow this week.
